description: Equip: Reduce the effectiveness of crowd controlling effects by 10%. Successfully applying a loss of control effect to an enemy, interrupting an enemy, or dispelling any target will increase all your secondary stats by 80 for 15 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Equip: Hammer of Wrath has 1 extra charge and increases Holy damage done by 4% for 10 sec, stacking 3 times.

Equip: Dropping Windfury Totem grants you 100% chance to gain Windfury Weapon and increases Windfury Weapon damage by 25% for 12 sec. 

This can only occur once every 1 min.
Equip: You gain 33% haste for 20 sec after summoning your Celestial.
Equip: Earth Shield healing is increased by 150% if your Earth Shield target is below 75% health, and Healing Wave adds a stack of Earth Shield to your target, up to 9 maximum stacks.
Equip: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 65% effectiveness.
Equip: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 65% effectiveness.

Equip: Tiger Palm now has a 10 yard range and dashes you to the target when used.

Tiger Palm also applies an effect which increases your critical strike chance by 50% for 6 sec on the target. This effect cannot be applied more than once every 1 min per target.

Equip: Tiger Palm now has a 10 yard range and dashes you to the target when used.

Tiger Palm also applies an effect which increases your critical strike chance by 50% for 6 sec on the target. This effect cannot be applied more than once every 1 min per target.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.
Equip: Earth Elemental has a permanent Earthquake attached to it.
Equip: Replaces Templar's Verdict with Final Verdict, a devastating strike that deals 5,225 Holy damage. Has a 15% chance to activate Hammer of Wrath and reset its cooldown.
Equip: Spell Reflection lasts 60% longer and applies to your nearest ally.
Equip: Activating Bladestorm, Recklessness, or Avatar randomly casts one of the other two abilities at reduced effectiveness.
Equip: For every 15 seconds that you do not cast Shadow Mend, the healing of your next Shadow Mend is increased by 50%.  This effect can stack up to 4 times.

Equip: Dropping Windfury Totem grants you 100% chance to gain Windfury Weapon and increases Windfury Weapon damage by 25% for 12 sec. 

This can only occur once every 1 min.
Equip: Casting Eye Beam summons an allied Vengeance Demon Hunter who casts Fel Devastation.
Equip: Holy Shock protects the target with a shield of Holy Light for 18 sec, absorbing damage equal to 20% of the Holy Shock every 6 sec. Can protect up to 5 targets.
Equip: Demon's Bite leaves an open wound on your enemy dealing 2,157 Chaos damage over 15 sec and increasing damage taken from your Immolation Aura by 65%.
Equip: Replaces Templar's Verdict with Final Verdict, a devastating strike that deals 5,154 Holy damage. Has a 15% chance to activate Hammer of Wrath and reset its cooldown.
Equip: Activating Bladestorm, Recklessness, or Avatar randomly casts one of the other two abilities at reduced effectiveness.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.
Equip: Feign Death cooldown reduced by 15.0 sec, and Feign Death now removes most negative status effects from yourself.
